author: elecharny
msg: o Modified the PersistedBTree initialization to use the parent cache and readTransactions set when it's a sub-btree
o The PersistedBTree.getBtreeOffset() method now correctly return the BtreeHeader offset, instead of the BtreeInfo offset
o The RecordMaager.loadBtree() method takes the parentBtree as a parameter if required

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-590: Enforce coarse-grained authorization checks in the Lucene plugin; commit derby-590-14-aa-coarseGrainedAuthorization.diff.

author: sebb
msg: Private immutable fields might as well be final
